title: In order to make the Urban Renewal Scheme viable, the Officer appointed by the Planning Authority shall be competent to sanction any relaxation in marginal open spaces except front marginal open spaces and parking requirements wherever necessary due to bonafide hardship, for reasons to be recorded in writing which shall not affect general health, fire and safety requirements
clause_text: In order to make the Urban Renewal Scheme viable, the Officer appointed by the Planning Authority shall be competent to sanction any relaxation in marginal open spaces except front marginal open spaces and parking requirements wherever necessary due to bonafide hardship, for reasons to be recorded in writing which shall not affect general health, fire and safety requirements. However the Govt. or Empowered Committee shall have the power to relax any of the provisions in these Regulations.
section: Relaxation in Building and other requirements:-

source_pdf.text_snippet: In order to make the Urban Renewal Scheme viable, the Officer appointed by the Planning Authority shall be competent to sanction any relaxation in marginal open spaces except front marginal open space
